title: Inventory Application
description: An inventory and labor tracking application. Developed with React, Node, Materialize, and ApexCharts to display data.

title: Simple contact collector
description: A very simple contact sharing application. This was developed while working as a tutor teaching others to build their first full stack application.

title: Mock Jeopardy
description: A game put together using React, express and the context API. Shares question answer pairs across users. Master password to register is Iglooworks

title: Javascript Trivia
description: A trivia game put together with React, Express, Node, and Firebase. Authentication distinguishes between both which organizations data to apply and if user has Admin access

title: Bike Shop ecommerce site coming soon
description: Come back and see the finished product soon.
